game.name: CASSETTE BOY
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 보고 있지 않은 건, 존재하지 않아… 『CASSETTE BOY』는, 카메라 시점을 조작하며「보이는 세계」를 변화시키는 퍼즐 액션 RPG입니다. 2D 픽셀 풍의 3D 세계를 회전시켜 장애물을 사라지게 하거나 새로운 길을 나타내게 하며, 사라져 버린 달의 수수께끼를 다가섭니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: What you can’t see… doesn’t exist. CASSETTE BOY is a puzzle action RPG where you control perspective to change the world you see. Rotate a 2D pixel-styled 3D world, using disappearing obstacles and newly appearing paths to uncover the mystery of the vanished moon.
